Welcome to the Eat documentation!
This page contains all documentation pages for the eat manager. Eat is an open-source package manager that installs programs while not affecting system directories - only your directories. For more info, see "About Eat" document or the Eat website. The docs are expected to be viewed via the links terminal browser. Regular GUI browsers are also supported, but THEY ARE DISCOURAGED FOR VIEWING THE EAT DOCS.
